Home Security Statistics

Facts about Burglary, Property Crimes, and Home Security Alarms

  • Each year in the United States, a burglary occurs every 14 seconds.
  • Most burglaries occur during the day between 6am and 6pm.
  • Homes without a monitored security alarm system are 3 times more likely to be burglarized or robbed than those with a monitored home security system.
  • In more than a third of all burglaries, the burglar enters the front door (and most of the time does it forcefully).
